mapper.insert: insert into hm_qna (qnaNum, qnaTitle, qnaContent, qnaWriter) values (hm_qna_seq.nextval, #{qnaTitle}, #{qnaContent}, #{qnaWriter} )
insert into hm_comment (comNum, comContent, qnaNum) values (hm_comment_seq.nextval,#{comContent},#{qnaNum})
mapper.update: update hm_qna set state = 1 where qnaNum = #{qnaNum}
